metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5323 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The _TIFFFax3fillruns function in libtiff before 4.0.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and application crash) via a crafted Tiff image.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5323` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> possibly same fix as CVE-2016-5321 this will not be fixed in precise/esm

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.1').
